resources.string: Manage your money by keeping track of your expenses and provide estimates of costs per day, week and month.
Keep your data safe in sync across multiple devices enabling you to use the app even in offline mode.
Transform your lists into sheets that are compatible with Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets.
Artificial Intelligence makes it easy and fast to trace your costs by using Google Assistant or scanning a receipt.
Adaptive mode adjusts the theme of Smart List making it easier on your eyes by dimming the light in the darkness or by making the screen more visible in the strong light
